scripts.seed-test: npm run setup-dbs && NODE_ENV=test knex seed:run
scripts.seed:prod: NODE_ENV=production DB_URL=$(heroku config:get DATABASE_URL) knex seed:run
scripts.migrate-latest:prod: NODE_ENV=production DB_URL=$(heroku config:get DATABASE_URL) knex migrate:latest
scripts.migrate-rollback:prod: NODE_ENV=production DB_URL=$(heroku config:get DATABASE_URL) knex migrate:rollback
scripts.test-insomnia: npm run setup-dbs && npm run seed && npm start
scripts.test-serverfunctions: npm run setup-dbs && npm run seed && node server/serverFunctions/testServerFunctions.js
